data.name: DocumentIndex
desc: specifies service of content indexes within a document.

types.name: DocumentIndexMarks
desc: contains all index marks that are related to this index.

properties.name: IsCaseSensitive
desc: determines if the similarity of index entries is checked case sensitively.

properties.name: Locale
desc: contains the locale of the index.

properties.name: MainEntryCharacterStyleName
desc: determines the name of the character style that is applied to the number of a page where main index entry is located.

properties.name: SortAlgorithm
desc: contains the name of the sort algorithm that is used to sort the entries.

properties.name: UseAlphabeticalSeparators
desc: determines if alphabetical separators are generated.

properties.name: UseCombinedEntries
desc: determines if same entries on different pages are combined into one index entry.

properties.name: UseDash
desc: determines if following page numbers are displayed using a dash.

properties.name: UseKeyAsEntry
desc: determines if an index entry is generated for each primary/secondary key.

properties.name: UsePP
desc: determines if following page numbers are displayed using a \"pp.\".

properties.name: UseUpperCase
desc: determines if all entries start with a capital letter.
